fw.name: OptimizationInterfaces

method.name: AfterLastUpdate
method.abstract: Allows to restore the settings impacted by the BeforeFirstUpdate() method.

method.name: AllHistoricToString
method.abstract: Returns a string describing the history of the optimization algorithm.

method.name: BeforeFirstUpdate
method.abstract: Initializes Settings.

method.name: BeforeLastUpdate
method.abstract: Allows to restore the visualization settings for the last update.

method.name: GetBestResultIndex
method.abstract: Returns the index of the Opimization Log corresponding to the best solution found according to the problem defined.

method.name: GetEndIterationNotification
method.abstract: Retrieves the event send when an iteration of the algorithm is done.

method.name: GetSetting
method.abstract: Gets an algorithm setting.

method.name: InitUpdate
method.abstract: Initializes the update management engine.

method.name: LaunchUpdate
method.abstract: Asks the update management engine to launch the update of the inputs/outputs.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Triggers the computation of the user algorithm.

method.name: SendEndIterationNotification
method.abstract: Sends the end of iteration notification.

method.name: SetSetting
method.abstract: Sets an algorithm setting.

method.name: CreateAlgoSettingsFrame
method.abstract: Creates the settings frame of a user algorithm.

method.name: CreateStopAlgoDialog
method.abstract: Creates the stop dialog of a user algorithm.

method.name: GetDerivativeErrorMessages
method.abstract: Returns an error message if the tests of the existence of the derivatives has failed.

method.name: GetFirstOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Returns the first order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: GetMagnitude
method.abstract: Returns the name of the magnitude used by the underlying contraint.

method.name: GetNthOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Returns the second order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: GetNumberOfParameters
method.abstract: Returns the number of parameters involved in the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: GetNumberOfValues
method.abstract: Returns the number of values actually output by this sensor.

method.name: GetOutputErrorMessages
method.abstract: Returns an error message if the method GetOutputValues has failed.

method.name: GetOutputErrors
method.abstract: Retrieves the status of each output.

method.name: GetOutputValues
method.abstract: Retreives the values output by the feature.

method.name: GetParameters
method.abstract: Returns the parameters involved in the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: GetParametersDelta
method.abstract: Gets the parameters variations for the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: GetSecondOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Returns the second order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: IsNumberOfOutputsVariable
method.abstract: Specifies if the feature implementing this interface may output a different number of values after each call to GetOutputValues().

method.name: SetFirstOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Sets the first order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: SetParameters
method.abstract: Specifies the parameters with respect to the derivatives of the object (local sensor or else) are calculated.

method.name: SetParametersDelta
method.abstract: Specifies the parameters variations for the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: SetSecondOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Sets the second order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: TestDerivativesExistence
method.abstract: Tests the existence of the derivatives of the feature implementing this interface with respect to the parameters passed in argument.

define.name: CATOptGenericAlgorithmCATIType
define.abstract: The type of the OptGenericAlgorithm feature.

define.name: CATOptOptimizationPackageName
define.abstract: The name of the optimization package for type descriptions.

define.name: CATOptTerminationNoImprovement
define.abstract: Defines for the termination criterion decoding (ie criterion = CATOptTerminationTime | CATOptTerminationNoImprovement | CATOptUserDefinedCriterion).

define.name: CATOptTerminationTime
define.abstract: Defines for the termination criterion decoding (ie criterion = CATOptTerminationTime | CATOptTerminationNoImprovement | CATOptUserDefinedCriterion).

define.name: OPTNLSFileName
define.abstract: The name of the NLS file.

class.name: CATIKwoWorkshopAddin
class.abstract: Interface to implement in order to integrate your toolbar in the PEO workbench.

class.name: CATIOptAlgorithm
class.abstract: This interface describes the basic behaviour of an optimization algorithm.

method.name: AllHistoricToString
method.abstract: Returns a string describing the history of the optimization algorithm.

method.name: CheckCompatibility
method.abstract: This method checks if the global optimization definition is compatible with the current algorithm.

method.name: GetBestResultIndex
method.abstract: Returns the index of the Opimization Log corresponding to the best solution found according to the problem defined.

method.name: GetEndIterationNotification
method.abstract: This event is triggered every time you want during the algorithm run.

method.name: GetSetting
method.abstract: Gets an algorithm setting.

method.name: OneHistoricToString
method.abstract: Returns a string describing the history of the optimization algorithm.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: This method launches a run of optimization, with respect to the algorihtm settings, problems, and goals defined in the feature optimization.

method.name: SetSetting
method.abstract: Sets an algorithm setting.

class.name: CATIOptAlgorithmUIFactory
class.abstract: Interface to give a way to edit the settings of an optimization algorithm.

method.name: CreateAlgoSettingsFrame
method.abstract: Creates a frame and dialogs to edit the algorithm settings.

method.name: CreateStopAlgoDialog
method.abstract: Instantiates an interruption dialog.

class.name: CATIOptCntSatisfaction
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to constraint satisfaction solving.

method.name: Solve
method.abstract: Solves the constraint satisfaction feature.

class.name: CATIOptFactory
class.abstract: This interface is the factory of optimization features.

method.name: CreateFreeParameter
method.abstract: Creates a free parameter for the optimization problem.

method.name: CreateGoal
method.abstract: Creates a goal for the optimization problem.

method.name: CreateGradient
method.abstract: Creates a GradientAlgorithm.

method.name: CreateOptimization
method.abstract: Creates an optimization.

method.name: CreateOptimizationLog
method.abstract: Creates an optimization log for the optimization problem.

method.name: CreateProblem
method.abstract: Creates an optimization problem.

method.name: CreateSimulatedAnnealing
method.abstract: Creates a Simulated Annealing algorithm.

class.name: CATIOptFreeParameter
class.abstract: Interface dedicatedto the free parameter of the optimization.

method.name: GetDoubleValues
method.abstract: Gets the list of double (= mks values) allowed to valuate the parameter given by the GetParameter() method.

method.name: GetInfRangeParm
method.abstract: Since V5R14, it is possible to define a relation (formula, rule etc.

method.name: GetNominalValueParameter
method.abstract: Gets the parameter which contains the nominal value.

method.name: GetParameter
method.abstract: Gets the final free parameter.

method.name: GetParameterOrPub
method.abstract: Gets the publication or the free parameter.

method.name: GetRanges
method.abstract: Gets the ranges if the parameter has some.

method.name: GetRelaxedFlag
method.abstract: Gets the relaxed flag.

method.name: GetStep
method.abstract: Returns the step if the parameter has one.

method.name: GetStepParm
method.abstract: Since V5R14, it is possible to define a relation (formula, rule etc.

method.name: GetStringValues
method.abstract: Gets the list of strings allowed to valuate the parameter given by the GetParameter() method.

method.name: GetSupRangeParm
method.abstract: Since V5R14, it is possible to define a relation (formula, rule etc.

method.name: GetVariableFlag
method.abstract: Gets the variable mode.

method.name: SetDoubleValues
method.abstract: Sets the list of double (= mks values) allowed to valuate the parameter (if the parameter given by the GetParameter() method is numerical (= NOT of type "String")).

method.name: SetParameter
method.abstract: Sets the parameter that the free parameter will represent.

method.name: SetParameterOrItsProxy
method.abstract: Sets the free parameter that the free parameter will represent with the care of selective loading capability.

method.name: SetRanges
method.abstract: Sets the ranges and booleans that say if the free parameter has inf range and sup range.

method.name: SetRelaxedFlag
method.abstract: Sets the relaxed flag according to the given value.

method.name: SetStep
method.abstract: Sets the step and the boolean if the free parameter has a step.

method.name: SetStringValues
method.abstract: Sets the list of strings allowed to valuate the parameter (if the parameter given by the GetParameter() method is of type "String").

method.name: SetVariableFlag
method.abstract: Sets the variable mode according to the given value.

class.name: CATIOptGoal
class.abstract: This interface encapsulates an optimization goal : it has mainly a goal parameter, an objective (minimum, maximum, target value) and a priority (used only in multigoals optimization).

method.name: GetGoalParameter
method.abstract: Gets the final goal parameter.

method.name: GetGoalParameterOrPub
method.abstract: Gets the goal publication or the goal parameter.

method.name: GetGoalType
method.abstract: Gets the goal type.

method.name: GetHighFlag
method.abstract: Get the high flag attribute value.

method.name: GetHighParm
method.abstract: Get the parameter used to defined the high bound.

method.name: GetHighParmValue
method.abstract: Get the value of the high parameter if the high flag is equal to 1.

method.name: GetLowFlag
method.abstract: Get the low flag attribute value.

method.name: GetLowParm
method.abstract: Get the parameter used to defined the low bound.

method.name: GetLowParmValue
method.abstract: Get the value of the low parameter if the low flag is equal to 1.

method.name: GetPrecision
method.abstract: Gets the wanted precision.

method.name: GetTargetValue
method.abstract: Gets the target value parameter.

method.name: GetWeight
method.abstract: Gets the Goal weight.

method.name: SetGoalParameter
method.abstract: Sets the goal parameter.

method.name: SetGoalParameterOrItsProxy
method.abstract: Sets the goal parameter with the care of selective loading capability.

method.name: SetGoalType
method.abstract: Sets the goal type.

method.name: SetHighFlag
method.abstract: Valuate the high flag attribute.

method.name: SetHighParmValue
method.abstract: If the high flag is equal to 1, this method sets the value of the high parameter.

method.name: SetLowFlag
method.abstract: Valuate the low flag attribute.

method.name: SetLowParmValue
method.abstract: If the low flag is equal to 1, this method sets the value of the low parameter.

method.name: SetPrecision
method.abstract: Sets the wanted precision (when the goal type is TargetValue).

method.name: SetTargetValue
method.abstract: Sets the value of the target value parameter (when the goal type is TargetValue).

method.name: SetWeight
method.abstract: Sets the Goal weight.

class.name: CATIOptOptimization
class.abstract: Interface dedicated to the management of the optimization feature.

method.name: AddFreeParameter
method.abstract: Adds a free parameter (the free parameters can be modified during the optimization).

method.name: GetAlgorithm
method.abstract: Gets the algorithm used for this optimization.

method.name: GetFreeParameters
method.abstract: Returns the collection of free parameters.

method.name: GetOptimizationLock
method.abstract: Returns the lock or unlocked status of some optimization attributes.

method.name: GetOptimizationLog
method.abstract: Gets the optimization log used.

method.name: GetOptimizationType
method.abstract: Gets the Optimization type.

method.name: GetProblemToSolve
method.abstract: Returns the interface describing the problem to optimize.

method.name: GetRunningModeFlag
method.abstract: Gets the running mode flag.

method.name: GetUpdateMode
method.abstract: Returns the Update Mode used in Product/Part/Analysis environement.

method.name: GetUpdateVisualizationFlag
method.abstract: Gets the update visualization flag.

method.name: LaunchUpdate
method.abstract: Launches a model update.

method.name: LockOptimization
method.abstract: Specifies if some attributes of the optimization can be modified.

method.name: RemoveFreeParameter
method.abstract: Removes a free parameter (by handler or by index if handler null).

method.name: RunHasToStop
method.abstract: Indicates or forces if the optimization run has to stop or not.

method.name: SendOptimizationError
method.abstract: Sends an optimization error.

method.name: SetAlgorithm
method.abstract: Sets the algorithm to use for this optimization.

method.name: SetOptimizationLog
method.abstract: Set the optimization log.

method.name: SetOptimizationType
method.abstract: Sets the Optimization Type.

method.name: SetProblemToSolve
method.abstract: Sets the problem to optimize.

method.name: SetRunningModeFlag
method.abstract: Sets the running mode flag.

method.name: SetUpdateMode
method.abstract: Specifies the Update Mode used in Product/Part/Analysis environement.

method.name: SetUpdateVisualizationFlag
method.abstract: Sets the update visualization flag.

class.name: CATIOptProblem
class.abstract: Interface to encapsulate the data access to an optimization problem definition.

method.name: AddConstraint
method.abstract: Adds a constraint.

method.name: AddGoal
method.abstract: Adds a goal.

method.name: GetConstraints
method.abstract: Returns the list of constraints defined for the problem optimization definition.

method.name: GetGoals
method.abstract: Returns the list of goals defined for the problem optimization definition.

method.name: RemoveConstraint
method.abstract: Removes a constraint.

method.name: RemoveGoal
method.abstract: Removes a goal.

class.name: CATIOptUpdateManagement
class.abstract: Interface to ask for an update model in the Optimization context.

method.name: AfterLastUpdate
method.abstract: This method is called after the last update asked by the optimization.

method.name: BeforeFirstUpdate
method.abstract: This method is called before the first update asked by the optimization algorithm.

method.name: BeforeLastUpdate
method.abstract: This method is called before the last update asked by the optimization algorithm.

method.name: GetAverageUpdateDuration
method.abstract: Returns the average update duration since last reset (ResetUpdateDurationCalculus).

method.name: GetLastUpdateDuration
method.abstract: Returns the last update duration.

method.name: Init
method.abstract: Initializes the update engine on the current document, in accordance with the given inputs and outputs.

method.name: LaunchUpdate
method.abstract: Launches the ouputs computations in accordance with the inputs modifications.

method.name: ResetUpdateDurationCalculus
method.abstract: Resets the average update duration calculus.

method.name: SetInputs
method.abstract: Initializes the list of objects whose modifications will be taken in account during the update.

method.name: SetOutputs
method.abstract: Initializes the list of objects that will be recomputed.

class.name: CATIOptValuesAndDerivativesAccess
class.abstract: This interface describes the basic behaviour of an object that provides multiple values and its own derivatives in the context of optimization.

method.name: GetDerivativeErrorMessages
method.abstract: Returns an error message if the tests of the existence of the derivatives has failed.

method.name: GetFirstOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Returns the first order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: GetMagnitude
method.abstract: Returns the name of the magnitude used by the underlying feature.

method.name: GetNthOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Returns the nth order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: GetNumberOfParameters
method.abstract: Returns the number of parameters involved in the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: GetNumberOfValues
method.abstract: Returns the number of values actually output by the feature that implements this interface.

method.name: GetOutputErrorMessages
method.abstract: Returns an error message if the method GetOutputValues has failed.

method.name: GetOutputErrors
method.abstract: Retrevieves the status of each output.

method.name: GetOutputValues
method.abstract: Retrevieves the values output by the feature.

method.name: GetParameters
method.abstract: Returns the parameters involved in the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: GetParametersDelta
method.abstract: Gets the parameters variations for the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: GetSecondOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Returns the second order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: IsNumberOfOutputsVariable
method.abstract: Specifies if the feature implementing this interface may output a different number of values after each call to GetOutputValues.

method.name: SetFirstOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Sets the first order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: SetParameters
method.abstract: Specifies the parameters with respect to which the derivatives of the object (local sensor or else) are calculated.

method.name: SetParametersDelta
method.abstract: Specifies the parameters variations for the calculus of the derivative.

method.name: SetSecondOrderDerivative
method.abstract: Sets the second order derivatives with respect to the variables.

method.name: TestDerivativesExistence
method.abstract: Tests the existence of the derivatives of the feature implementing this interface with respect to the parameters passed in argument.

class.name: CATIOptimizationLog
class.abstract: Interface for the management of the data stored in the type late OptSolutions.

method.name: AddIndex
method.abstract: Adds the index in the list of indexes.

method.name: AddParameterInOptimLog
method.abstract: Adds an additional column corresponding to a parameter.

method.name: AddRowInOptimLog
method.abstract: Captures the current values of the parameters given while creating the optim log and store them next to the last row of parameters configuration.

method.name: ExportOptimLogToFile
method.abstract: Exports the optimization historic in a file.

method.name: GetBestParameter
method.abstract: Returns the parameter valuated by the best value of the goal parameter.

method.name: GetMaxRowIndex
method.abstract: Returns the number of rows currently in the optimization log.

method.name: GetOptimLogPath
method.abstract: Returns the Optimization Log path.

method.name: GetOptimLogRowsIndexes
method.abstract: Returns the list of Optimization log rows.

method.name: GetRowFromOptimLog
method.abstract: Fills the given list with the content of the optimization log row.

method.name: InitializeOptimLog
method.abstract: Creates and initializes the optimization logging tools.

method.name: RemoveIndex
method.abstract: Removes the i th element in the list of indexes.
